product_name: Pearl Izumi Thermal Conductive Bike Gloves - Men's
long_description: The Pearl Izumi Thermal Conductive bike gloves let you check the map on your smartphone while keeping your fingers covered in cold weather. P.R.O. Thermal fabric provides optimal insulation, moisture transfer, dry time and odor resistance. Conductive synthetic fabric on index finger and thumb works with touchscreen devices. Fleece fabric on thumb provides a soft place to wipe your nose. Silicone-screened palms give you a reliable grip. Pearl Izumi Thermal Conductive bike gloves feature reflective elements for increased visibility in low light.
